escalate: When ESC during the weekend/late Friday use the "Weekend escalation template" template
tone: Don't use the term "customer service team", use "customer care" instead
dos_and_donts: Do not direct cx to contact the carrier
Do not provide customers with dates for restock before checking with our team.
promo_and_exclusions: They have only 2 sales per year (June/November) - when those end the sale items are removed from the site

If you have any more questions, feel free to let me know. For now, what do you think about this instead? - https://julievos.attn.tv/alZKNzbSnALC

send_to_cs: Send to CS for repair/customization requests
escalate: If a cx had issues after a sale is over, ESC to see if they can honor the deal
ESC immediately, if the customer asks when an order will ship
If a cx has a request for urgent delivery ESC and they'll prioritize it
ESC if a cx is having trouble placing an order
If a cx asks for an update regarding an email they sent, ask for their email address, then ESC
ESC immediately if a cx is very upset
ESC if cx's have issues applying both loyalty codes
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
templates: ‚ûú Ask which item the customer has
‚ûú If it's an Ellington item from before 2016, use ECR shortcut
dos_and_donts: For stock questions, check the product page to look for possible back-in-stock dates
If cx calls after hours, advise them to leave a voicemail and the team will be sure to call back
drive_to_purchase: When recommending a pre-order item - set proper expectations and mention the date it'll be back in stock
promo_and_exclusions: They have a loyalty program where cx's can use code MMLEGACY20 & FAITHFULSHIPPING at the same time to receive 20% off plus free shipping. The MMLEGACY20 code only applies to cxs who have spent $2000+
‚ûú These are the only 2 codes that can be stacked, and they can only be stacked with each other and no other code
Welcome code works on discounted/sale items
DO NOT share the WELCOME15 code with cx's, it's no longer valid

conversation.message_text: Mission Mercantile: Welcome to Mission Mercantile! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.
Mission Mercantile: Hey this is Sarah, how can I help you?
As I stated I need a leather duffle for march 1st guaranteed to be approved for a carry on do you have any
Mission Mercantile: Thanks for your interest! I'll be happy to check on this with my team! As soon as I hear back, I will send you a message right away!

Mission Mercantile: The Theodore Weekender will ship around Jan 23rd! https://www.missionmercantile.com/products/theodore-leather-weekender-duffle-bag The Benjamin Duffle will ship around February 6th! https://www.missionmercantile.com/products/benjamin-leather-duffle-bag If you prefer rolling luggage, we also have the Theodore Wheeled Carry-On, which will ship February 20th. https://www.missionmercantile.com/products/theodore-leather-wheeled-rolling-carry-on-duffle-bag.
Ok because my flight schedule I leave march 1st I have to get it before then

Mission Mercantile: What do you think of the options I shared in my previous message? It looks like the shipping timelines will work for your flight schedule. Please note that we customize and ship in-stock products within 24-48 hours. Once shipped, it takes 1-5 days domestically. Expedited shipping is available, for an upcharge.
I think I would like to order the Theodore weekender today
I'd like to personalize it with an NLG also

Mission Mercantile: Great choice! You can place your order here: https://missionmercantile.attn.tv/aqXzl-O_iY6O. Please click the "Add Personalization" button to personalize your order. Let me know how it goes.
I already ordered it thank you
Mission Mercantile: That's great! Thank you for shopping with us, and I hope you enjoy your new purchase. Feel free to reach out anytime if you have questions!
I ordered it but forgot to personalize it what do I do now
Template used: "Can I personalize / customize any product, even if it doesn't show the option to do that?"; last updated: 2022-07-25 13:52:51.248
Mission Mercantile: Sorry to hear that. You can reach out to shopkeeper@missionmercantile or 210-504-6698, and Lori will check if the personalization can be added to your purchase.

I see twin XL Do you sell a regular size twin?
Nectar: Yes, we offer a regular size Twin mattress. You can find it here: https://nectarsleep.attn.tv/a7612WWy_iq5
Can I get a bundle with 2 regular twins and 2 adjustable frames? I wish to have a split adjustable but do not have the space for the XL.

Nectar: Thanks for reaching out! At this time, we don't offer a pre-set bundle with 2 regular twin frames and 2 adjustable bases. Our adjustable frames are available in Twin XL sizes only, which is why a split adjustable requires XL dimensions. If space is a concern, you may consider pairing regular twin frames with our standard bases instead.

dos_and_donts: If the customer wants to 'lose weight', don't give out product recommendations, tell them to consult with a healthcare provider
Don't recommend any products to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease
drive_to_purchase: Refer the customer to Amazon if the product is not available on the website but in-stock there
promo_and_exclusions: Codes can NOT be applied to subscription orders
welcome/rewards codes cannot be applied to seasonal at the moment
unavailable_products: Olly has removed the products "Lovin Libido" and "Mighty Mojo" off the site. The product are still available on Amazon and in stores.
